title.@value: Acquired regurgitation of the neoaortic valve of truncal origin

definition.@value: Acquired backward flow through the neo-aortic valve, when the neo-aortic valve results from biventricular repair of common arterial trunk (truncus arteriosus)

label.@value: Acquired regurgitation of the neoaortic valve of truncal origin
Acquired insufficiency of the neoaortic valve of truncal origin
